thread.title: 5 horrifying zits we hope Dr. Pimple Popper can cure with her new skincare line
thread.title_full: 5 horrifying zits we hope Dr. Pimple Popper can cure with her new skincare line

author: Laura Vitto
title: 5 horrifying zits we hope Dr. Pimple Popper can cure with her new skincare line
text:
Sandra Lee, M.D., known to her fans as Dr. Pimple Popper, has a new venture on the horizon: A line of skincare products for all the zit-prone folks out there.
The internet-famous dermatologist announced the line's launch in a post to — where else — her enormously popular Instagram account.
SEE ALSO: NSFL: Salivary stones are even more disgusting than popping pimples
It still feels so surreal to finally have the SLMD products in my hands! ✨ I'm so proud of the SLMD Skincare line and hope these products will be able to help those of you with acne prone skin or those of you that are just looking to stay blemish free! 🌟 I can't wait to hear what you all think of it. ❤️ @SLMDskincare orders will be shipped out TODAY! 📪 Be on the look out. 👀 If you haven't already shop it at slmdskincare.com 💥 Link in bio! #SLMDskincare #Drpimplepopper #ClinicalConfidence
A post shared by Sandra Lee, MD Dermatology (@drpimplepopper) on Mar 6, 2017 at 12:01pm PST
The line features four products. There's a cleanser, a lotion, a clarifying treatment and a moisturizer, all to help ensure its users don't end up with zits like the Lee's known for.
Her unusual rise in fame, and subsequent skincare line, comes thanks to the pimple popping videos that earned Lee her nickname.
But these zits are not like the blemishes you picked at in the mirror all through high school. These are massive, puss-filled monster cysts waiting for a gentle dermatologist to banish them for good. A quick glance at her Instagram is enough to decide whether you're in or out. With 2.3 million followers, it's clear Lee is onto something.
Not brave enough to navigate directly to Dr. Pimple Popper's Instagram page? We've got five horrifying examples cued up for you, if you dare.
Cream. #drpimplepopper SOUND ON 🔈🔉🔊
A post shared by Sandra Lee, MD Dermatology (@drpimplepopper) on Mar 7, 2017 at 8:40pm PST
You don't like it?! Yeah, you LOVE it. 💁🏻#drpimplepopper ✌🏼❤💥
A post shared by Sandra Lee, MD Dermatology (@drpimplepopper) on Feb 23, 2017 at 5:01pm PST
It's just cyst smell..don't worry😉 #drpimplepopper #cyst #squeeze #smell
A post shared by Sandra Lee, MD Dermatology (@drpimplepopper) on Feb 13, 2017 at 2:10pm PST
When all the stars...I mean Steatocystomas align👉🏼✨👈🏼 Session 10 PART2 now up on my YouTube Channel. Link in bio!😜
A post shared by Sandra Lee, MD Dermatology (@drpimplepopper) on Feb 8, 2017 at 9:47am PST
This is what I call...the CYST SENSE. Link in bio;) #drpimplepopper #cyst #squeeze
A post shared by Sandra Lee, MD Dermatology (@drpimplepopper) on Mar 9, 2017 at 9:31am PST
WATCH: Someone has invented a waterproof toupee that looks just like real hair
